name: whatsapp-integration
description: Send messages, manage conversations, and handle read receipts via WhatsApp Cloud API. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: whatsapp_integration
toolDefinition.description: Send messages, manage conversations, and handle read receipts via WhatsApp Cloud API. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: send_message (send a text message), mark_read (mark a message as read), get_messages (not supported -- webhook-based), send_template (send a template message)

to.description: Recipient phone number. Required for send_message and send_template.

messageId.description: Message ID to mark as read. Required for mark_read.

conversationId.description: Filter by conversation ID. Optional for get_messages.

language.description: Language code for template (e.g. "en", "es"). Optional, defaults to "en".
